description:
These cogs are stuff typically utility stuff that I wanted myself that might be useful to others.
It's mainly cogs for bot or server owners.

If you find anything that's wrong, feel free to make a GH issue or find me in the main Red server or the cog support server (https://discord.gg/GET4DVk). I'm Vexed#0714
install_msg:
Thanks for installing this! These cogs are typically utility stuff that I wanted myself that might be useful to others.
If you find anything that's wrong, feel free to make a GH issue or find me in the main Red server or in the cog support server https://discord.gg/GET4DVk - I'm Vexed#0714.

All these cogs have detailed documentation! Check them out at <https://cogdocs.vexcodes.com/>
